Announcements

12/6
Here is the take home final and its LaTeX source.
10/18
Here are notes on the Weierstrass Approximation Theorem.
8/28
Here are the files for a demo Latex solution set.
  • HWDemo.tex, the main file with the solutions
  • homework641.cls, a class file that defines the formatting
  • hwextras.tex, a file for extra macros and definitions (this will be shared by all students) ave used LaTeX before.
8/28
Here is a beginner’s guide to LaTeX. Please read it, even if you have used LaTeX before.
8/28
In this class, you are required to use LaTeX to typeset solutions. If you are new to using LaTeX, I can help. Your first step is to install LaTeX; here are some installation guides.

  • Latex Installation for Windows

  • Latex Installation for Mac

I didn’t write a guide for Linux; if you are using Linux and need help just let me know.

8/28
We will use Piazza for course-related discussions outside of class time. You’ll need to sign up to start using the service.
